name: James Santorum
story: Matthew joined the military to follow in his father's footsteps. He has now been serving for 15 years and has been recently deployed to the fictional island of Altis in the Mediterranean. He is responsible for supporting the Missile Specialist in his unit and ensuring that their weapon systems are functioning properly. He is a quiet man, preferring to keep to himself, but is loyal to his country and his unit. He married his high school sweetheart and they have two children together.
